name: Levy Nkeneng
speech: 🚀 Passionate software engineer with a versatile skill set spanning multiple domains. I thrive on solving complex challenges across different platforms and environments, adapting quickly to new technologies and methodologies. My holistic approach combines technical expertise with creative problem-solving, allowing me to develop solutions that are both innovative and practical. I'm driven by continuous learning and a commitment to excellence, whether working independently or collaborating with diverse teams to create impactful, scalable solutions.
title: Levy Nkeneng's Portfolio
description: Explore the professional portfolio of Levy Nkeneng, a skilled web developer and software engineer specializing in modern frontend and backend technologies. Discover projects, skills, and experience in JavaScript, TypeScript, Astro, React, and more.

achievements: Created a range of client e-commerce websites using Shopware 6, Symfony and Webpack
Developed custom plugins and themes to enhance functionality and user experience.
Collaborated with designers to implement responsive and visually appealing user interfaces.
Managed twig templates and integrated them with Shopware's backend systems.

projects.name: laravel-docker

projects.name: blitz-task
projects.description: A tasks-managment app powered by symfony showcasing features like dragand-drop of tasks, files upload, ai-chat and much more. Still in construction...

projects.name: team-anaconda
